quote: We in the Middle East like to talk politics, we like to argue. Just look at the three prophets - Moses, Jesus and Mohammad. They are all from this small region which creates problems all the time.
quote_letters: WE IN THE MIDDLE EAST LIKE TO TALK POLITICS WE LIKE TO ARGUE JUST LOOK AT THE THREE PROPHETS - MOSES JESUS AND MOHAMMAD THEY ARE ALL FROM THIS SMALL REGION WHICH CREATES PROBLEMS ALL THE TIME
